p:
Pretreatment processes could be grouped into three categories: Physical, chemical, and thermal [ 69, 70]. More specifically, the typical pretreatment steps could be identified according to the list below; these steps could be used separately or could be combined:
▪
Battery pack dismantling,
▪
Sorting by chemistry,
▪
Discharging,
▪
Crushing and shredding,
▪
Material separation,
▪
Electrolyte recovery,
▪
Binder separation,
▪
Thermal treatment,
▪
Washing.
